info.description: This is an API reference for GeOMe-db. Below you will see the main sections of the API. Click each section in order to see the endpoints that are available in that category.
info.title: GeOMe-db API

tags.name: Records_-_Query
tags.description: Query a project's records. See Fims Docs for more detailed information regarding queries.

get.summary: Export all data for a given expedition
Service used for getting the current status of the dataset validation/upload.

put.summary: Service to upload a dataset to an expedition.
put.description: The validate service must be called before this service.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: required. The dataset id returned from the validate service

post.summary: Service for a client app to exchange an oAuth code for an access token

get.summary: Service for a client app to log a user into the system via oAuth.

parameters.name: token
parameters.description: refresh or access token to invalidate

post.summary: Service for an oAuth client app to exchange a refresh token for a valid access token.

get.summary: Fetch all projects available to the current user

parameters.name: includePublic
parameters.description: If we should include public projects

parameters.name: admin
parameters.description:
Flag used to request projects the authenticated user is an admin for. Note: this flag
                      takes precedence over all other query params

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The id of the project to update

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: The updated project object

get.summary: Get a project config

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The id of the project to update

parameters.name: config
parameters.description: The updated projectConfig object

get.summary: Get a list of a Projects Expeditions

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The project to get expeditions for

parameters.name: admin
parameters.description:
If present, all expeditions will be returned, regardless of the expedition owner. Note: this flag
                       takes precedence over all other query params

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: If present, only the expeditions for the authenticated user will be returned

parameters.name: includePrivate
parameters.description: Include the authenticated users private expeditions in the results

403.description:
Invalid request. Either using admin flag and user is not the project admin, or requesting
 expeditions for a private project that the user is not a member of.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The projectId of the expeditions to be updated

parameters.name: expeditions
parameters.description: The Expeditions to be updated. Note: The expeditions must already belong to the projectId

400.description: A given expedition does not belong to the project

get.summary: Get an expedition

403.description: not allowed to create expedition in this project

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The projectId the expedition belongs to

parameters.name: expeditionCode
parameters.description: The expeditionCode of the expedition to update

parameters.name: expedition
parameters.description: The Expedition to be updated. Note: The expedition must already belong to the projectId

400.description: A given expedition does not belong to the project

403.description: not the expedition owner or the project's admin

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: The projectId the expedition belongs to

parameters.name: expeditionCode
parameters.description: The expeditionCode of the expedition to delete

get.summary: get project members

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: the project to remove the user from

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: the username of the user to remove

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: the project to remove the user from

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: the username of the user to remove

404.description: user not found as project member

get.summary: Get a template
Get a Record by ark id

403.description: Invalid request. The provided ark id is missing a suffix

get.summary: Query project resources, returning CSPACE file

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: the query to run

get.summary: Query project resources, returning CSV file

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: the query to run

post.summary: Query project resources, returning a CSV file

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: the query to run

get.summary: Query project resources, returning excel workbook

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: the query to run

post.summary: Query project resources, returning a excel workbook

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: the query to run

get.summary: Query project resources, returning FASTA file

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: the query to run

get.summary: Query project resources, returning JSON

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
the page number to return Ex. If page=0 and limit=10, results 1-10 will be returned. If page=2 and
                  limit=10, results 21-30 will be returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: the number of results to return

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: the query to run

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: the query to run

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
the page number to return Ex. If page=0 and limit=10, results 1-10 will be returned. If page=2 and
                    limit=10, results 21-30 will be returned

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: the number of results to return

get.summary: Query project resources, returning KML file

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: the query to run

post.summary: Query project resources, returning a KML file

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: the query to run

post.summary: Query project resources, returning a TAB delimited text file

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: the query to run

get.summary: Query project resources, returning TAB delimited text file

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: the query to run

get.summary: get all registered users

403.description: you are not a project admin

post.description: must have a valid invite token

400.description:
invalid user object
invalid invite code
duplicate username

post.summary: Send a user invite via email notification
Service for a user to exchange their reset resetToken in order to update their password

get.summary: get user

403.description:
you must be authenticated to access a users profile
you must be a project admin to access another user's profile
You cannot update another user's profile.
You cannot update another users password.

post.description:
Will send an email to the user's registered email
 if the user is found

get.summary: Retrieve a file

number.description: the number of the current {@link Slice}.

numberOfElements.description: the number of elements currently on this {@link Slice}.

content.description: Returns the page content as {@link List}.

direction.description: Returns the order the property shall be sorted for.

property.description: Returns the property to order for.

nullHandling.description: Returns the used {@link NullHandling} hint, which can but may not be respected by the used datastore.

alias.description: return the alias for which this list is known

fields.description: Get the set of fields that belong to this list
